content: this cowl is worked from the top down in the round with increases to create the center point finished measurements circumference 25¾ at narrowest point around neck depth 21 at center front point materials premier® yarns cotton fair® worsted 52% cotton 48% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 207yds/190m 2178-14 succulent 3 balls needles us size 6 4mm 24 circular or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle 3 stitch markers 2 in one color and 1 in another gauge 19 sts x 26 rnds = 4 in st st save time check your gauge skills/techniques used in this pattern knit and purl stitches knitting in the round m1l and m1r increases
